commit.message:
trans-types.c (gfc_get_nodesc_array_type): Don't vary types depending on debug info.

* fortran/trans-types.c (gfc_get_nodesc_array_type): Don't
vary types depending on debug info.

From-SVN: r141021

files.patch:

+	* fortran/trans-types.c (gfc_get_nodesc_array_type): Don't
+	vary types depending on debug info.
